message.title: Brewery
message.content: This is the local brewery. In the career mode you can unload barley and wheat here. How much money you are paid depends, among other things, on the day of the week.

message.title: Village Center
message.content:
Many of the residents moved here to get away from the stressful city life.
They were not quite ready to ditch their cars, though, as they enjoy driving around frequently.

message.title: "Payzan Flora"
message.content:
The Payzan family has been running this garden center for over two generations.
In the career mode you sometimes get the opportunity to transport some pallets with fertilizer to the supermarket.

message.title: Fields
message.content: The island mainly lives off agriculture. You can cultivate fields like these and invest the gained money in better farm machinery.

message.title: Tractors Can't Swim!
message.content:
Pay attention not to drive too deeply into the water or you will run the risk of losing your vehicle to the sea.
In the career mode you can reset sunken or stuck vehicles back to your farm by clicking the "Reset Vehicles" option in the menu.

message.title: Welcome to the Island!
message.content:
This mission leads you to several landmarks of the island and gives you a few hints about the game.
Have you activated the PDA map (I) yet?
You can remove text messages like this one by pressing the left mouse button.

message.title: Supermarket
message.content: This is the major shopping center of the island. A large part of its goods are imported from the mainland.

message.title: Skating Park
message.content: Even though this park is intended for skateboards only, you can also try to do a fakie 360 frontside pop shove-it with your tractor.
